class Solution:
    def isValid(self, word: str) -> bool:
        # Check length constraint
        if len(word) < 3:
            return False
        
        # Check character constraints
        vowels = set('aeiouAEIOU')
        consonants = set('bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyzBCDFGHJKLMNPQRSTVWXYZ')
        valid_chars = set('0123456789') | vowels | consonants
        if any(char not in valid_chars for char in word):
            return False
        
        # Check for at least one vowel and one consonant
        has_vowel = any(char in vowels for char in word)
        has_consonant = any(char in consonants for char in word)
        return has_vowel and has_consonant
